# Contributing to codesaur/template

First of all, thank you for taking the time to contribute ‚ù§Ô∏è  
Contributions of any kind are welcome.

---

## Ways to Contribute

You can contribute by:

- Reporting bugs
- Suggesting new features or improvements
- Improving documentation
- Submitting pull requests (PRs)

---

## Getting Started

1. Clone the repository:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/codesaur-php/Template.git
cd Template
```

2. Install dependencies:

```bash
composer install
```

3. Run tests to ensure everything works:

```bash
composer test
```

---

## Coding Guidelines

- Follow existing coding style and conventions
- Keep changes focused (one feature or fix per PR)
- Write or update tests when applicable
- Update documentation if behavior changes

---

## Pull Request Rules

- One logical change per pull request
- Provide a clear description of what and why
- Make sure all tests pass before submitting

---

## Commit Messages

Use clear and descriptive commit messages, for example:

- `fix: resolve nested variable replacement issue`
- `feat: add custom filter support for TwigTemplate`
- `docs: update README examples`

---

## Documentation

If your change affects usage or public API:
- Update `README.md`
- Update files under `docs/` if needed
- Update `CHANGELOG.md` for notable changes

---

## Code of Conduct

Be respectful and constructive.  
This project follows a friendly, inclusive open-source culture.

---

## Security Issues

For security-related issues, please follow the instructions in  
[SECURITY.md](SECURITY.md).

---

Thank you for helping improve the **codesaur ecosystem** ü¶ñ
